@Kitno wrote:

I experienced this same error last night. It has to do with your commands. You messed up somewhere. I ended up never finding it so I just used my backup client.java and did a little bit of copying and pasting. If you can’t do that, delete all the commands you recently added/edited.

@hanif wrote:

try changing that to:

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox"))
	{
		teleportToX = 3024;
		teleportToY = 3924;
                heightLevel = 0;
		inwildy = true;
	sendMessage("Welcome to the PKbox! Don't die!this is the awesomePk BOX!!");
	}

if that doesn’t work, then change OR delete the void and make a new one! It’s what I do even when I created my very first mini game the interface!~

sendMessage("CurrentX: “+currentX+” CurrentY: "+currentY);
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " says… " +command.substring(5);
}
}
